Key Match Events: Giorgi Chakvetadze scored a penalty to give Georgia a 1-0 lead
Giorgi Chakvetadze scored a second goal for Georgia
Mikautadze scored a third goal for Georgia
Kochorashvili scored a fourth goal for Georgia
Lukas Kalvach scored a consolation goal for the Czech Republic
Pre-Game Insights: Georgia were promoted to the UEFA Nations League Group B1
Czech Republic were relegated from the UEFA Nations League Group A1
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia got off to a perfect start in their first second-flight campaign in the Nations League
Czech Republic followed up their worst Euros as an independent nation with a fifth consecutive UNL defeat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivan Hasek had to make an enforced change due to Matej Rynes' injury
Others: Georges Mikautadze was handed his award for top-scoring at Euro 2024
